text:
Good day everyone,

Is there any functionality on how to send a custom report to a third party software? In this case to adobe sign. Like which is the best approach to follow to send a custom report

Hi guys

We preload *Multiple checkbox -* values in a HubSpot form, so the user can change their settings. Unfortunately the standard behavior is that this field type is only enriched and not changed. So If you deselect any values it will not be written back to the contact. Only additional selections are added.

Is there an easy solution to this? To my mind this is just worsen data quality.
Is there a beta to access "comment mode" (like in emails) on website pages?

Hi <@U03SPJUT665>  I think that at this moment is not possible to put HS reports in another system as a frame. But should be doable probably with API. Alternatively, you could use <http://funnel.io|funnel.io>
Hi <@UT35DSBMF> - workaround could be to use multiple checkbox II and solve this with WF; clear data then set property value (append).
Hi <@UDHT6N5SM> - I don't think this is in beta at the moment.
Bummer. It looks like it could be pretty useful
Hi <@U043PCAFUBS> - let's chat about it. I can help.
Iâ€™m pretty sure it will be sooner or later.
Hi <@U043UHR8LV7> - let's chat about this if you still have issues with this integration.
